Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api

Class WaitABit

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.WaitABit

  • public final class WaitABit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to suspend thread execution for sometime instead of Thread.sleep(long)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void waitABit​(long millis)
      This method suspends thread execution for a time defined in milliseconds.
      static void waitABit​(java.time.Duration duration)
      This method suspends thread execution for a time defined as a duration value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        millis - is a time of thread suspending

      • waitABit

        This method suspends thread execution for a time defined as a duration value.
